name: Engineering Enablement by Abi Noda | Leading a DevEx team through transformation | Ana Petkovska (Nexthink)
summary: In this episode, Abi speaks with Ana Petkovska, who is currently leading the developer experience team at Nexthink. Ana takes us through her journey of leading a DevOps team that underwent multiple transformations. She explains how her team went from being a DevOps team to EngProd and eventually...
